Title: Mongoose
Description: Mongoose is an attempts at merging old fashioned MDI and modern UI in a common UI library.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Mongoose is an attempt at merging old fashioned MDI and modern UI in a common library.

It currently mainly includes an MDI control called Surface. This control is a simple ItemsControl and can be used as such. A surface Pad will be created as an item container for each of the Surface items.
